page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: Farming is important in the area of Great Bolas. We interviewed four people at four farms,they were very helpful.The people we interviewed were at Dodecote grange,Common farm,Manor farm and Burliegh farm.The helpful people were Mr.Lee,Mr.Maddocks,Mr. Mitchell and a farmer who didn't tell us his name.Mr.Maddocks who owns Common farm also owns Burliegh farm. His farming area consists of 850 acres.Mr.mitchell has 158 acres of land.Mr.Lee has 110 acres,the other man had 58 acres.Mr.Lee's crops were barley,sugerbeet and wheat.The other farmer had sugarbeet,potatoes,wheat and barley.We asked the people whether they had been a farmer all their adult life.Most of them said they had exept for Mr. Maddocks and Mr.Mitchell.It was interesting to find out all about Agriculture that day.
